mapper.select: SELECT xf FROM t_cage WHERE cage_id = #{cageId} limit 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_cage c LEFT JOIN t_cage_position p ON c.cage_id = p.cage_id WHERE c.create_time = TO_DAY(NOW()) - 1 AND p.base_id = #{baseId} AND p.shack = #{dovecoteNumber} AND c.state = 0 AND c.xf = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) amount, state, abnormal FROM t_cage c LEFT JOIN t_cage_position p ON c.cage_id = p.cage_id WHERE c.create_time = To_DAY(NOW()) - 1 AND xf = 0 AND p.base_id = #{baseId} AND p.shack = #{dovecoteNumber} GROUP BY state , abnormal
